chunks.chunk_text: Hello 同情家族Welcome to 15 Minutes. Today 《同情學英語》我是 John 老師在今天節目開始之前提醒大家要到 Apple Podcast 給我們五星評分以及留言幫《同情學英語》灌溉成長的養分不論你是喜歡我們的每日更多單元《VOCAB》《Intense》還是《Look Back Sunday》的節目都非常歡迎大家每日給自己15分鐘提升英語力Now let's get started
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_每日英語跟讀 Ep.K626_ 革命性的室溫超導體LK-99引發全球爭議.json

chunks.chunk_text: Revolutionary room temperature superconductor LK99 sparks global debate
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_每日英語跟讀 Ep.K626_ 革命性的室溫超導體LK-99引發全球爭議.json
RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_每日英語跟讀 Ep.K626_ 革命性的室溫超導體LK-99引發全球爭議.json

chunks.chunk_text: Observed in materials only at extremely low temperatures near absolute zero making practical applications challengingSubsequent research identified a few high-temperature superconductors but they still require significant coolingThe novelty of the Korean researchers' claim lies in LK99's ability to maintain superconductivity at temperatures up to around 127°C
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_每日英語跟讀 Ep.K626_ 革命性的室溫超導體LK-99引發全球爭議.json

chunks.chunk_text: which could revolutionize various technological fieldsThe material composition of LK99 consists of copper, lead, phosphorus and sulfurrending it cost-effective and readily available for potential industrial applicationsThe prospect of room-temperature superconductors has sparked excitement with possibilities ranging from faster microchips and more efficient electric motors
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_每日英語跟讀 Ep.K626_ 革命性的室溫超導體LK-99引發全球爭議.json

chunks.chunk_text: to wireless electricity transmission and improved medical scannersQuantum computing, a field that relies heavily on superconducting materials could also benefit significantly from room-temperature superconductors potentially eliminating the need for bulky refrigeratorsDespite the enthusiasm, skepticism abounds within the scientific communityThe papers detailing LK99 are preprints
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_每日英語跟讀 Ep.K626_ 革命性的室溫超導體LK-99引發全球爭議.json

chunks.chunk_text: that undergo peer review or publication in reputable scientific journalsResearchers worldwide have attempted to replicate LK99's properties but so far none of these efforts have been successfulSome scientists synthesize the material for testing purposes while others evaluated LK99 using theoretical methodsBoth approaches have yet to provide direct evidence of superconductivity
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_每日英語跟讀 Ep.K626_ 革命性的室溫超導體LK-99引發全球爭議.json
